synopsis.text:
Along the picturesque shores of Enoshima, a socially anxious young man named Yuki Sanada finds himself in a whirlwind of extraordinary adventures. Having moved around frequently with his grandmother, Yuki struggles to form lasting connections due to his crippling fear of social interactions. However, everything changes when he encounters the enigmatic and self-proclaimed alien, Haru. Armed with a water gun and a fish bowl housing his beta fish companion, Haru is a force to be reckoned with, immediately latching onto Yuki as a friend despite his reluctance.

Together with fellow classmate and local fisherman Natsuki Usami, the trio embarks on a series of out-of-this-world fishing expeditions. As they navigate through the challenges and triumphs of their shared pastime, they also discover the importance of friendship and camaraderie. But unbeknownst to them, a mysterious organization and a looming threat to the town lurk in the background, setting the stage for an unlikely adventure filled with heart, humor, and self-discovery. Join Yuki, Haru, and Natsuki as they navigate the unpredictable waters of life and friendship in Tsuritama, a unique blend of science fiction and fishing.
